resources.string: 1.- How many moons are in Jupiter?
2.- What are the name(s) of Mars\' moons?
Mars has two moons: Phobos and Deimos
3.- How many days would it take to reach mars?
Mars is one light year from Earth
4.- How many days are in Saturn year?
It will take around 10,585 days or 29 years for Saturn to go around the sun
5.- What is the name of the closest galaxy to us?
The closest galaxy to us is called Andromeda
